system.description: Your voice is commanding and full of authority.
system.basicAction: Once per scene, and only in a fight or tense situation, you can make a call to arms that grants your comrades within Short range a +1 bonus to their next action.
system.advAction: Your warcry is so terrifying that once per scene, with a successful opposed PRESENCE vs INSIGHT test, you can force an opponent to spend their next action running from you. If the opponent is on horseback you may try to spook the horse instead—roll PRESENCE vs ANIMAL HANDLIN’. If successful the horse is spooked (see page XXX).
